MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Lanark Road and surrounding streets. Our team have been working to repair an underground cable fault outside 547 Lanark Road. They have managed to restore supplies to some customers and are working to restore all remaining supplies by 8:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25PM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
